projects.title: Color Matching Game
projects.description: Developed a dynamic game with over 50 color tiles using the Fisher-Yates Shuffle algorithm for fairness. Features a responsive UI, scoring system, and countdown timer for enhanced interaction.

projects.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors Game
projects.description: Created a state-managed game with React, handling logic and UI responsiveness. Planned future enhancements for multiplayer functionality and real-time score tracking.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Built a comprehensive personal portfolio with dynamic data fetching and seamless navigation. Responsive design with a high mobile-friendly score for optimal viewing across devices.

projects.title: Solar System Simulation
projects.description: Developed a 3D solar system simulation using JavaScript and WebGL. The simulation includes orbiting planets and interactive camera controls for immersive exploration.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: Created a simple and interactive Tic Tac Toe game using JavaScript. Implemented features such as player turn indication, game reset, and winner determination logic.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a scalable and secure e-commerce platform with a real-time product search, cart functionality, and integrated payment gateway using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).

projects.title: Blogging Platform
projects.description: Built a fully-featured blogging platform with user authentication, rich text editor, and real-time comments functionality using Django and React.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Developed a full-featured task management application with CRUD functionality, user authentication, and task filtering. Built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for efficient data handling.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Created a weather application that fetches real-time data from a public weather API. The app displays weather conditions, forecast, and city search functionality with a clean UI design.

projects.title: Online Bookstore Web Application
projects.description: Built a full-stack online bookstore with user authentication, cart functionality, and secure payment integration. Developed using React, Node.js, and MongoDB for efficient data management.
